scripts.dev: yarn workspace frontend run dev & yarn workspace backend run start:dev
scripts.build: yarn workspace frontend run build & yarn workspace backend run build
scripts.start: yarn build && yarn workspace backend run start
scripts.lint: yarn workspace frontend run lint & yarn workspace backend run lint
scripts.type: yarn workspace frontend run type & yarn workspace backend run type

scripts.prisma:push: yarn workspace backend run prisma db push
